title: Non-functional Requirements
body_html:
Non-functional Requirements

Security

  • HTTPS-only webhook targets
  • HMAC-SHA256 signatures (X-Huly-Signature-256)
  • API key or session-based auth for management endpoints
  • IP allowlist (optional)

Reliability

  • At-least-once delivery semantics
  • Retry with exponential backoff; max attempts configurable
  • Dead letter queue / failed status tracking

Performance

  • Minimal overhead to transaction processing
  • Async delivery via queue/worker when available
  • Indexed queries for listing & history

Compliance

  • Log redaction of secrets
  • PII considerations in payloads where applicable

Operability

  • Health checks, metrics, structured logs
  • Config via env vars; safe defaults
